name: Plotly
short_description:
Collaborative data analysis and visualization for Python, R, MATLAB, & Excel.
2D, 3D, and live-streaming graphs.
long_description:
Plotly is a web-based graphing and analytics platform. Plotly offers paid plans
and on-premise instances of Plotly for private collaboration and free accounts
for public projects. Plotly helps its users share data, graphs, and code with
teammates, collaborators, and the world.
